dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Keller Williams Realty just topped the list of America's happiest companies for 2018.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Keller Williams Realty just topped the list of America's happiest companies for twenty eighteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Careers site CareerBliss launched its eighth-annual list of the happiest companies in America. Keller Williams Realty takes the top spot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that—they have like 175,000 agents, right? And they really emphasize internal growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that-they have like one hundred seventy five thousand agents, right? And they really emphasize internal growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Austin, Texas company has 175,000 agents across more than 900 metro areas and claims to be the worlds largest real estate franchise by agent count. A Keller Williams Realty employee wrote on CareerBliss.com, One of the greatest benefits is how our company promotes from within.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, one employee even mentioned how the company promotes from within and supports career control.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, one employee even mentioned how the company promotes from within and supports career control.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Keller Williams Realty employee wrote on CareerBliss.com, One of the greatest benefits is how our company promotes from within. All employees are encouraged and supported to be in control of their growth and career paths.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge. And Nike came in second, which isn't surprising given their brand strength and that NIKE Direct initiative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge. And Nike came in second, which isn't surprising given their brand strength and that N I K E Direct initiative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sneaker king Nike ranks second. In June it announced its NIKE Direct initiativethe company is trying to sell more of its products directly to consumers through its website and own stores, rather than rely on traditional retailers like Foot Locker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, selling more through their own stores and site instead of relying on Foot Locker—smart pivot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, selling more through their own stores and site instead of relying on Foot Locker-smart pivot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Adobe at number four is interesting too. They invented PDFs back in the 90s, and apparently it's a ton on paper and costs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adobe at number four is interesting too. They invented PDFs back in the 90s, and apparently it's a ton on paper and costs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adobe is the fourth happiest company, according to CareerBliss. The Silicon Valley tech giant invented PDFs and launched them 1993.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almost 90% savings, which is wild. Plus, their work culture sounds super collaborative and energizing according to reviews.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almost ninety percent savings, which is wild. Plus, their work culture sounds super collaborative and energizing according to reviews.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It claims PDFs have led to a 91% reduction in environmental impact and 90% cost savings when compared with paper-based processes. The atmosphere is highly collaborative and energizing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then Amgen in fifth place—their arthritis drug Enbrel brought in over $6 billion last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Amgen in fifth place-their arthritis drug Enbrel brought in over six dollars billion last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Arthritis drug Enbrel is its top-selling product, bringing in nearly $6 billion in sales last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But employees aren't just there for the profits; one person mentioned how rewarding it was to impact patients' lives directly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But employees aren't just there for the profits; one person mentioned how rewarding it was to impact patients' lives directly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Working for Amgen was very rewarding to see the positive impact we made in patients lives, reported a West Coast employee.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That sense of purpose really seems to drive happiness, more than just the paycheck sometimes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sense of purpose really seems to drive happiness, more than just the paycheck sometimes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's not just about the brand or the money—it's feeling valued and having balance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's not just about the brand or the money-it's feeling valued and having balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Like that Amgen reviewer who loved the on-campus daycare and smart coworkers. Little things add up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like that Amgen reviewer who loved the on-campus daycare and smart coworkers. Little things add up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work-life balance is great, fantastic daycare on campus, lots of smart co-workers, wrote one CareerBliss reviewer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Makes you think about what really makes a workplace great beyond the surface stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Makes you think about what really makes a workplace great beyond the surface stuff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's culture, opportunity, meaning—all that good stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's culture, opportunity, meaning-all that good stuff.
